cmDspPgm : Dataflow program instance interface.

typedef cmDspRC_t (*cmDspPgmFunc_t)( cmDspSysH_t h, void** userPtrPtr );

typedef struct
{
  cmChar_t*      label;
  cmDspPgmFunc_t loadFunc;
  void*          userPtr;
  cmDspPgmFunc_t unloadFunc;
  
} _cmDspSysPgm_t;



_cmDspSysPgm_t* _cmDspSysPgmArrayBase();
